import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';// appApi
import appApi from'../services/appApi';var initialState=null;export var userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:initialState,reducers:{logout:function logout(){return initialState;},addNotification:function addNotification(state,action){state.notifications.unshift(action.payload);},resetNotifications:function resetNotifications(state){state.notifications.forEach(function(obj){obj.status="read";});}},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.signup.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.login.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.addToCart.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.removeFromCart.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref4){var payload=_ref4.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.increaseCartProduct.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref5){var payload=_ref5.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.decreaseCartProduct.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref6){var payload=_ref6.payload;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.createOrder.matchFulfilled,function(_,_ref7){var payload=_ref7.payload;return payload;});}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,logout=_userSlice$actions.logout,addNotification=_userSlice$actions.addNotification,resetNotifications=_userSlice$actions.resetNotifications;export{logout,addNotification,resetNotifications};export default userSlice.reducer;
